scenarios.name: Register new user and then log in with the newly created user

steps.text: I go to the login menu I try to login with the newly created user.

scenarios.name: Try and log with Qbet user

steps.text: I go to the login menu I try to login with iBet user.
Login was not successful due to non-existing credentials.
I go to the login menu I try to login with invalid credentials.
User is promted to enter a valid email.

scenarios.name: Register new user and then try to log in with the valid email but invalid password

steps.text: I go to the login menu I try to login with the newly created email but invalid password.
Login was not successful due to non-existing credentials.

scenarios.name: Go to register from login menu

steps.text: I go to the login menu and I click the register link.
I am taken to the registration menu.
